abstract: Joseph John "Joe" Cole (born 8 November 1981) is an English footballer who plays for West Ham United as a midfielder. He started his career with West Ham, where he played more than 120 league games during five years, until he left for Chelsea in 2003. Cole won a number of trophies with Chelsea, including three Premier League titles and two FA Cups before leaving on a free transfer in July 2010 to join Liverpool. Just a year later he joined Lille on loan. In January 2013 he returned to his first professional club, West Ham. He is described as "a technically gifted player with the creativity to unlock a defence". He has been capped by the England national team on 56 occasions.
